content: materials * approximately 15 yards of worsted weight yarn in each of these colors red yellow blue orange green purple pink brown white black * yarn needle * polyfil * small amount of black yarn or 3-d paint for eyes * canvas bag to store your fish size 4 inches gauge unimportant just needs to be tight enough the polyfil doesn t show through **do not add beads or buttons as children could choke on them the 3-d paint sticks very well even if a child did pull them off they are too small to cause choking and aren t toxic **
